description:
Renders a user-friendly login modal, guiding users through identification, authentication, and error handling in a multi-step process. Supports login via email/username/phone number and password, as well as Google authentication.

@component

handleCloseModal.description: Function used to handle the Closing of the Edit profile modal, so it doesn't appear when needed

openModal.description: The state of the sign up modal, if false then it's not shown else it's shown
